channel.title: Chicken on Something We Ate
channel.description: Recent content in Chicken on Something We Ate

item.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
item.description: Half bag (~8oz) of amish homestyle egg noodles1 1 large yellow onion ~1.5-2 lbs dark meat2 chicken with skin and bones. 3 large carrots 4 stalks of celery 1-2 bayleaves Paprika - optional 2-3 Saffron Threads - optional Salt Pepper Broth In a large pot, add all of your chicken. It is important to leave the skin and bones on as they provide much of the flavor for the broth.

item.title: The Best Grilled Chicken Marinade
item.description: Grilled Chicken recipes are always a crowd-pleaser. This easy grilled chicken marinade recipe will become a favorite! Source: addapinch.com INGREDIENTS ½ cup olive oil 1 teaspoon sea salt ½ teaspoon ground black pepper ½ teaspoon paprika ½ teaspoon cumin ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper 2 cloves garlic, chopped 3 tablespoons chopped onion ½ cup chopped fresh parsley 1½ cups beer (1 12oz bottle) DIRECTIONS Pour olive oil into a 2-cup liquid measuring cup.
